snippet.title: Paper Lily - Chapter 1 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi all!

This video was made to announce the release of Chapter 1 on January 2023, alongside the Kickstarter to fund the development for the rest of the game. 

Kickstarter Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/leef6010/paper-lily
Devlog Post: https://leef6010.itch.io/projectkat/devlog/453375/update-9-chapter-1-and-kickstarter

※ Please note that everything in this video is subject to change and may not represent the final product.

Song by plasterbrain
[Original Song by Crawk]

Project Kat (Steam): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1698960/Project_Kat__Paper_Lily_Prologue/
Project Kat (itch.io): https://leef6010.itch.io/projectkat
Twitter (development updates): https://twitter.com/leef6010


Follow plasterbrain
Website: https://plasterbrain.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/plasterbrain

Follow Crawk
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Crawkrawk
Twitter: https://twitter.com/crawkrawk
